sql-statement.sql: SELECT T.UUID AS ID,T.ORG_UNIT_DESC AS NAME , 'TRUE' AS ISPARENT FROM SYS_ORG_INFO T WHERE T.ORG_UP_UUID=? UNION ALL SELECT T1.USER_ID AS ID,T1.USER_NAME AS NAME , 'FALSE' AS ISPARENT FROM SYS_USER_INFO T1 WHERE T1.ORG_UUID=?
SELECT T.UUID AS ID,T.ORG_UNIT_DESC AS NAME, 'TRUE' AS ISPARENT FROM SYS_ORG_INFO T WHERE T.ORG_UP_UUID='#'
SELECT T.USER_NAME FROM SYS_USER_INFO T WHERE T.USER_ID=?

SELECT T1.ORG_UNIT_ID AS DEPARTMENTID,T2.ORG_UNIT_ID AS PARENTDEP FROM SYS_USER_INFO T LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG_INFO T1 ON T1.UUID = T.ORG_UUID LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG_INFO T2 ON T2.UUID = T1.ORG_UP_UUID WHERE T.UUID=?

SELECT T3.USER_ID AS USERID ,T3.USER_NAME AS USERNAME ,T1.ORG_UNIT_ID AS DEPARTMENT ,T2.ORG_UNIT_ID AS PARENTDEP ,T4.ORG_UNIT_ID AS superiorDep ,T.ROLES AS GROUPSID FROM SYS_USER_INFO T LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_INFO T3 ON T3.UUID = T.UUID LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG_INFO T1 ON T1.UUID = T.ORG_UUID LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG_INFO T2 ON T2.UUID = T1.ORG_UP_UUID LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG_INFO T4 ON T4.UUID = T2.ORG_UP_UUID WHERE T.USER_ID = ?
SELECT T.ROLE_ID FROM SYS_ROLE_INFO T WHERE UUID=?
